The incredible growing baby said as he heavily stomped towards the refrigerator as he approached the refrigerator itself, as he tore the fridge's door off with his giant sized strength while he began devouring everything that was inside the fridge as his size and weight started increasing again until the fridge itself was empty as the incredible growing baby then tore the freezer door off as well, as he began devouring everything that was inside the freezer itself while his size and weight again was increasing until the freezer itself was empty, as the incredible growing baby then burped.

*Burp* "Excuse me" The incredible growing baby said.

Now what will happen next?
153.title: A giant version of myself

info.brief_description: About 2 Giant diaper kids and their babysitter
info.description:
The story is about a male teen who is shrunk by 2 kids aged 5 and 6. The Male Babysitter cannot die, but still feels pain. Both kids wear diapers and they like to stuff dolls and other small things in the front and back of their diapers. When you add chapters, please include that they wear diapers.

The Main Characters are:

Matt Corby
Age: 15yrs
Hobbies: Playing Video Games and playing Tennis.
Family: Mother and Father, lonely child.
Other Info: He often has a fetish to turn gay. And likes giants especially being owned by a giant and to be a giant too.

Corey Turner
Age: 5yrs
Family: Mother and has an older brother aged 6
Stuff he likes: He likes to stuff things smaller than him in the front and back of his diaper and pees and sometimes poop on them. He seems to be gay too.

Timmy Turner
Age: 6yrs
Family: Mother and a younger brother aged 5
Stuff he likes: He likes to stuff things smaller than him in the front and back of his diaper and pees and sometimes poop on them. He also seems to be gay.

YOU ARE ALLOWED TO INTRODUCE NEW CHARACTERS TO THE STORY.
YOU ARE ALLOWED ANYTHING IN THE STORY FROM VORE TO CLEAN AND TOILET STUFF IS ALLOWED IF YOU WANT TO. OTHER THAN THAT YOU CAN DO WHAT EVER YOU LIKE.

I CAN GIVE YOU GIFT POINTS NOW SINCE I HAVE GOT 3930GP. SORRY. ADD CHAPTERS PLEASE!! 100GP PER CHAPTER!!!!


ENJOY!!
